2054.subject: BUS
2054.descrlong: The internship in a hospitality-related organization under the direction of a faculty member.  Faculty members assist students in clarifying internship learning outcomes, identifying potential hotel/resorts within which to conduct the internship, and structuring and negotiating internship agreements with the host organization. The faculty member also acts as hand-on mentor throughout the internship. The student must prepare an internship application and an approved learning outcomes proposal before registering.  (Offered in spring as interest warrants.)
